entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump US is 47th in testing per capita. On par with the Cayman Islands and Belarus. Far behind the majority of the industrialized world.  It’s shameful and embarrassing. We’ve lost more Americans in the past few weeks than the entire Vietnam war (58K). 

https://t.co/zH1uDk8Svk
